original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽21.4. Nahetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika🔽Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nahetu sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nahetu sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  na hetu sa hetuka duka kusala ttika  na hetum na sa hetukam na kusalam dhammam paccayā na hetu sa hetukaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  na hetum na sa hetukam na akusalam dhammam paccayā na hetu sa hetukaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The reverse order of the law of conditionality, the Triad of the Law of Conditionality

original: Nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na ahetukam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu ahetukaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
